titles: Camera regis, or, A short view of London containing the antiquity, fame, walls, bridge, river, gates, tower, cathedral, officers, courts, customs, franchises, &c. of that renowned city / collected out of law & history and methodized for the benefit of the present inhabitants by John Brydall ...
author: Brydall, John, b. 1635?
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: London (England) --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
